title: Summon Kassern
description: Twelve Archangels.Twelve couples.Twelve months.Can they create the Holy Warriors needed to prevent the demon-spawned abominations from destroying the world.Let the Summoning Begin.****Satan has found a loophole in the rules that govern his battle against Good. The Archangel Uriel sends twelve Warrior Archangels to Earth on a mission to even the odds.Each Archangel has one month to find a couple, unite them, and use their union’s power to create the Holy Warriors needed to defend the world against Satan’s unholy creations.But the mission isn’t so simple when inheriting Humanity comes with challenges beyond the Angel’s training, and every milestone in the couple’s relationship effects the triumvirate’s strength.
author: Azure Boone
